title: Classic Old Fashioned Cocktail
description: A timeless cocktail that combines the smooth warmth of whiskey with the aromatic flavors of Angostura bitters and a hint of citrus.

steps.text: Place the sugar cube in an Old Fashioned glass.
Add the 3 dashes of Angostura bitters directly onto the sugar cube.
Pour 10 ml (2 teaspoons) of cold water over the sugar and bitters.
Muddle the ingredients in the bottom of the glass until the sugar is mostly dissolved.
Fill the glass with one large ice cube or several smaller ones.
Pour 60 ml of rye or bourbon whiskey over the ice.
Using a peeler or sharp knife, cut a strip of orange peel, ensuring minimal pith.
Gently twist the peel over the glass to release its oils, then rub it along the inside rim of the glass.
Drop the twisted peel into the glass as a garnish.
If desired, add a maraschino cherry as a final garnish.
Stir gently to combine the flavors before serving.
